title: Brownie Points
description: All I want is to be left alone, but unfortunately, Little Miss Sunshine is my new administrative assistant. The woman practically leaves a trail of glitter in her wake. She’s so cheery, it’s disgusting. Hopefully, it’s not contagious. Kill me now.My new boss is the epicenter of the grumpy universe. When I got this temp job, I thought it was a blessing. Wrong! If I don’t throttle him my first week, it’ll be a miracle. That alone should earn me a raise.Warning: Inside you’ll find two people that shouldn’t belong together, which means I totally have to make that happen.
author: Haven Rose
